user.title: Adaptive Lighting Pro Setup
user.description: Configure advanced adaptive lighting with per-zone manual control, environmental adaptation, and home modes.

zones.title: Zone Configuration - {zone_name}
zones.description: Define a lighting zone and select the lights it contains. Each zone can have independent brightness and color temperature ranges.

zone_profile.title: Zone Profile - {zone_name}
zone_profile.description: Configure brightness and color temperature ranges for this zone.

global_settings.title: Global Settings
global_settings.description: Configure adjustment increments and default timeouts that apply to all zones.

environmental.title: Environmental Settings
environmental.description: Configure lux sensor and weather integration for environmental brightness adaptation.

integrations.title: Integration Settings
integrations.description: Configure optional Sonos alarm synchronization and Zen32 scene controller integration.

error.invalid_brightness_range: Minimum brightness must be less than maximum brightness
error.invalid_color_temp_range: Minimum color temperature must be less than maximum color temperature
error.no_lights_selected: At least one light must be selected for each zone
error.zone_id_exists: A zone with this ID already exists
error.invalid_zone_id: Zone ID must be a valid slug (lowercase, no spaces)
error.adaptive_lighting_not_found: Adaptive Lighting integration not found. Please install it first.
error.switch_not_found: The specified Adaptive Lighting switch was not found

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only one instance of Adaptive Lighting Pro is allowed

adjust_brightness.name: Adjust Brightness
adjust_brightness.description: Adjust brightness by a fixed increment for specified zones or all zones.

increment.name: Increment
increment.description: Brightness change in percent (positive = brighter, negative = dimmer)

zones.name: Zones
zones.description: Specific zones to adjust (optional, defaults to all zones)

adjust_color_temp.name: Adjust Color Temperature
adjust_color_temp.description: Adjust color temperature by a fixed increment for specified zones or all zones.

increment.name: Increment
increment.description: Color temperature change in Kelvin (positive = cooler, negative = warmer)

zones.name: Zones
zones.description: Specific zones to adjust (optional, defaults to all zones)

set_mode.name: Set Home Mode
set_mode.description: Change the current home lighting mode.

reset_manual_adjustments.name: Reset Manual Adjustments
reset_manual_adjustments.description: Reset manual brightness and warmth adjustments to zero for specified zones or all zones.

zones.name: Zones
zones.description: Specific zones to reset (optional, defaults to all zones)

reset_all.name: Nuclear Reset
reset_all.description: Completely reset all settings, adjustments, modes, and timers to default state.

clear_manual_control.name: Clear Manual Control
clear_manual_control.description: Clear manual control flags for specified zones to restore adaptive lighting.

zones.name: Zones
zones.description: Zones to clear manual control for (required)
